General.Name: Solartron Public Company Limited
General.Description: Solartron Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, design, install, and invests in solar power generation systems in Thailand and internationally. It operates through five segments: Selling and Installation of Solar - Cell Systems, Distribution Solar - Cell, Sale of Electricity, Hire of Work, and Other. The company's products include solar cells, pumping and mini grid systems, solar rooftop systems, and solar modules. It also offers operation and maintenance services comprising surveys and design, installation, and after-sales services, as well as commissioning, monitoring, and maintenance services. In addition, the company engages in engineering, procurement, and construction of solar power systems and plants, as well as investment of solar grid connected systems; and production and sale of electricity from solar energy. Solartron Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
